title: Billing System Maintenance
content:
On 27.07.2021 we will perform maintenance work on our billing system from 12pm to 2pm (CEST). During this time, the Customer Center will be completely or partially unavailable.

2021-07-27T12:00:00.000Z
Update

The maintenance work is delayed by about 60min. Sorry for the inconvenience

2021-07-27T13:00:00.000Z
Resolved

The maintenance has been completed.
